name: Invoice Application
subtitle: Invoicing in beauty and style
description: A full-stack, fully responsive Invoicing Application programmed using HTML, CSS Grid, Flexbox, Svelte, NodeJS with Express.

name: The Planets
subtitle: Learn about our solar system
description: A fully responsive Single Page Application programmed using HTML, CSS Grid, Flexbox, ReactJS. All of the data displayed is populated utilizing a JSON file.

name: Client Website
subtitle: Facts about your nutrition
description: Re-done landing page for a client, completed using HTML, CSS, JS in Angular.

name: Charge Buddy
subtitle: Find EV Charging Stations near you
description: A fully custom, full-stack project. Utilizing ReactJS, Bootstrap, Google Maps API, and data sourced through Alternative Fuel Station API from NREL.gov. Users can create an account, save stations to their favorites, leave ratings and comments.

name: Password Generator
subtitle: Select criteria and generate a random password
description: Programmed using HTML, CSS Flexbox, ReactJS. User selections determine the characters randomly generated, and a strength rating is provided.

name: Rating Component
subtitle: Select a rating and submit!
description: An example of a rating component that can be utilized in a variety of situations. Programmed using HTML, CSS Flexbox, ReactJS.

name: Pricing Component
subtitle: View pricing options with a option toggle
description: Fully responsive, programmed using HTML, CSS Flexbox, ReactJS. An example of a pricing component to highlight subscription features and pricing.

name: Order Summary
subtitle: Interactive summary of a customer order
description: Responsive design, programmed using HTML, CSS Flexbox, ReactJS.

name: Product Details
subtitle: Highlight a product and pricing, add to cart
description: Responsive design, programmed using HTML, CSS Flexbox, ReactJS.
